name: Ico Vis à Vis - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Ico Vis à Vis originates from Roberto Lazzeroni's idea of pairing two Icolounge armchairs to create a two-seater sofa for intimate conversations: its shape allows those sitting to face each other and converse easily. The sofa has a structure in solid American walnut and is characterized by an "S"-shaped upholstered backrest which entirely envelops the figure of the occupant before extending to become an armrest. Thanks to its informal and extremely comfortable seat, Ico Vis a Vis offers an ideal solution for public spaces such as hotel lobbies, lounge areas and boutiques.
